Review.Titre: Careful - They depreciate voices at will!
Review.Contenu: I'm a 20-year marketing veteran who decided to use this for a client's project. I have audio, a phone system, and a few other things recorded... I log in today to add to the project and saw that the VOICE I was using is depreciated. Um... what if I have to make a change in the future to the hours?? What if I need to tweak something??? Figuring that the company could load the voice into my account, I opened a ticket. Nope! Pick another voice they told me. They basically said to screw off and there is nothing they will do. So if you use one of their voices, remember it can be depreciated at any time, and then you're screwed if you need to edit a project. Good Technology - Bad Leadership and customer service. Find a better provider is my suggestion.

False Advertising!! Professional Voice Cloning is NOT  a feature as they claim. Its a process where you have to submit your files and wait 4 or so WEEKS. Yet its sold and promoted as a feature. Company didnt reply to my request for refund. However they have an Affiliate program so suspect as often happens, a lot of YouTubers are promoting it for $ without actually using it.

Review.Titre: F**king scam site- first is says its…
Review.Contenu: F**king scam site- first is says its free but if you want to do anything - BOOM!!! pay you poor human with your liever, stupid f**king scam dont ever use it thx

Review.Titre: Ai voice generator works 20% of the…
Review.Contenu: Ai voice generator works 20% of the time but still eats up your minutes. Customer service is shocking and takes at least a day to get a 3 word response then they don't even bother resolving the issue.Voice generator is good when it works but there are better options

Waste of time and money.I'm experiencing some sort of glitch with this service and I'm not alone because other people are talking about it on Twitter. None of us have gotten a response from support. It's like the support team is non-existent.And while you're waiting for them to get back to you (which will never happen I fear at this point) you're getting closer to the date when your characters will reset and you'll have to pay for more (after just paying for the audio you can't use because it's a mess).

It just doesn't work for some users anymore, unfortunately. And no one with a "broken" account is able to get in touch with the company to get it fixed. Or if you do get in touch you aren't offered a solution or refund.I've tried to troubleshoot the problem with a number of customers who are having the same issue with their accounts and we'll probably have to do chargebacks to get our money back because there's no way to get a refund.

Review.Titre: Ridiculous pricing for what you get
Review.Contenu: Ridiculous pricing for what you get, shame on you elevenlabs. Just why.

How is it possible to go from frequently good outputs to no voices working? How can it be something I'm doing when the same voices worked fine before? Something is wrong with 11ai and they will blame you if you give them a heads up so they can investigate and fix the bug.Scammy and scummy. And so unprofessional. I want my money back.

Review.Titre: A Missed Opportunity for Effective Customer Service and Support
Review.Contenu: I’ve had an interesting experience with ElevenLabs, to say the least. As someone who reached out multiple times with a variety of inquiries, I found the customer service severely lacking. My messages were met with delayed and often ambiguous responses that made it difficult to move forward.It’s particularly frustrating because the potential for a meaningful collaboration is clearly there, given the company’s technological capabilities. My team and I were looking for a tailored solution that would fit our specific needs, and we were even willing to invest both time and resources into making it work. Yet, despite our active attempts to seek help and clarification, our offers were met with silence.Moreover, I can’t shake off the feeling that there seems to be some level of language or regional segregation, which feels counterproductive and unfair. One would expect a company in this field to be more inclusive and supportive in helping various nations with technological advancements, yet this has not been our experience.In conclusion, while ElevenLabs might offer a competitive product, their customer service and approach towards global inclusivity leave a lot to be desired.

Review.Titre: not good not bad seems not scam lol but…
Review.Contenu: not good not bad seems not scam lol but frust potentialkinds @KevinSchantalleYtube

Review.Titre: I suppose its decent if your only…
Review.Contenu: I suppose its decent if your only making a short voice over but for longer stuff its overly expensive and completely unreliable. Imagine uploading 5k characters and it completely mispronounces one of the words every time despite confirming spelling and even spelling it out phonetically, it STILL cant say the word correctly. So now I have to spend another 5k characyers trying to fix it repeatedly. Sure I could upload 500 at a time and be more careful but then ill be there all day. Sucky man overall its just a rip off and your better off doing the voice over yourself tbh

Review.Titre: They have their so called « Abuse…
Review.Contenu: They have their so called « Abuse buster » that gets triggered for no reason saying that I might have been using multi accounts or VPN…every time I try to use it 🤬

Review.Titre: I love the product...but...should only be charged for final VO output, not for all the trial and error to get it to sound correct.
Review.Contenu: I love the product, only reason for low stars is because of your billing policy.   Because VO timing is too fast and sounds unnatural, there is a lot of trial and error to get the VO to sound right.  I'm charged for pour quality output and every do-over attempt I have to do to get the VO to sound right.  I believe we should only be charged for word count that we actually export as a final product.******* additional response***** Thank you for your feedback on using "projects".  I tried it and it was not intuitively obvious. I couldn't figure out how to find and export the render. I'm a member of a large group of users that have signed up with your service, on the order of there are hundreds of us creating content on YouTube and we are migrating to your platform.  Someone in the group just mentioned that we should all petition ElevenLabs that we would like a way to do the voice synthesis without getting charged for do-overs.  Then another person dropped the name of a competitive platform that only charges for the word count of final product that is downloaded, so revisions due to quality issues from the original output are not charged.  I would like to request the ability to use the voice synthesis solution, not just projects, to experiment without being charged word count.  We all have 100,000+ final word count for our YouTube channels, but we are using far more than that due to quality issues.  The AI VO "breaks" if the content is too long, we don't get the right number of dashes.  Maybe the inflection of the voice has "upspeak" instead of going down at the end, or shadow sounds are added due to the dashes added to get natural pauses. We have all been discussing work around, like entering shorter text, closing the browser and re-opening it to refresh the AI VO after it "breaks", etc... Experimenting with the voice settings costs word count as well.  I see some in the group already leaving the platform to Wellsaid labs. I think this one change in your platform would be invaluable to you and your user base so they don't start looking for other solutions as they are saying it doesn't feel fair to be charged for errors created by the platform.  We don't mind having to do the work multiple times to get it right, we just mind getting charged for the errors that are out of our control.  I hope this is helpful.  Again, I love your platform and intend to stay.  I figured you would appreciate this "focus group" feedback from the honest and unfiltered chatter from a large group of your new customers that just flocked to your platform.
The AI is good, but the platform is messy and they never, ever respond to a query from a paying customer, even in my experience as a Creator category customer.
Transparent and listen to feedback, but they REALLY could implement OPUS as their download CODEC.

Love the expressive voices but would like more control like speeding up or slowing down and Pitch control.Also lately have been getting a lot of background noise and also the volume seems to change throughout the recording.

Every generated audio file sounds different. I tried to clone my own voice.Some are very good, but most are not good at all. And some don’t even sound like a human voice. It is as if AI is trying to guess (rather than clone) what my voice sounds like.I did an experiment:1) Using a clone of my own voice, I generated a short audio file.2) Without making any changes, I tried to generate an audio “twin” of that same voice. Two sentences that sounded like they were spoken back to back.3) It took 14 attempts to generate an audio file that sounded “similar” to the test file.Since so so many of the generated audio files are unusable, users should only be charged if they download the audio files. Users should be allowed to discard bad files and not be charged. I’m tired of paying for 13 unusable files just to get one good file.I want to add to this review that Eleven Labs' customer service is 5 Stars.

First the like: most of the voices they have are very natural. The gross dislike: buggy. I entered English words and it'd come out in German or some other languages. Sometimes, it'd mispronounce the simplest words. "Love" became "Loof". I'd have to do it over and over again and each time it's costing me since they charge by characters. They should implement a policy where retakes are not counted as part of the cost.

Review.Titre: Initially very impressive - but ultimately too inconsistent
Review.Contenu: I have only used the starter plan and while the voices do sound very realistic, they are too inconsistent.For a variety of reasons, it is necessary to split text up into smaller chunks but the voice will sound like a different person every time. I need to generate each chunk of text 3 or 4 times until I get the voice to match how it sounded the first time. As well as being inconvenient, this wastes large amounts of my allotted character quota.Either the voices need to be made more consistent, or the pricing model needs to change to accomodate the issue.

Review.Titre: nearly spot on but with some bugs
Review.Contenu: the feature to clone your own voice is great. but.... it does have some issues. I have a british accent and if you generate the same sentence multiple times it randomly switches to american. i sounded like "the Brain' form pinky and the brain at certain points lol. still pretty amazing sfuff

Review.Titre: The best AI voice out there HOWEVER it…
Review.Contenu: The best AI voice out there HOWEVER it is so expensive! Get rid of the character limit and reduce monthly cost and I will happily sign up for life.
Not meet my expectation...The voice creation is good, but voice cloning is behind the paywall.I recommend tortoise tts instead, not this.

Review.Titre: Voices are cloned very accurately but emotion control needed
Review.Contenu: Voices are cloned very accuratelyrics with the v2 models. Can be temperamental but that is the nature of AI. Would be better once we get speech to speech or more emotion control in the dialogue

Review.Titre: Impressive AI Voice Technology but Pricy
Review.Contenu: I've been using ElevenLabs AI voice technology for a while now, and I must say, I'm quite impressed. The voice outputs are incredibly realistic and the user interface is remarkably friendly. The features offered are fun to use and they add a unique dimension to my projects. I particularly appreciate the swift customer service and the timely responses to queries.However, despite the positives, there is one aspect that I find quite challenging - the pricing. I feel the cost is a bit on the higher side, which may deter some potential users. Yet, considering the quality of service provided, I can understand the pricing model.I would still highly recommend ElevenLabs for any voice-related needs, as long as you're prepared for the investment. The technology is undoubtedly top-notch, and in my opinion, it's a game-changer in the realm of AI voices.

Review.Titre: The output can be shotty and requires…
Review.Contenu: The output can be shotty and requires levels of verification to ensure everything is good. It is getting better over time though, and I will keep it updated.

Review.Titre: The best ai voices currently available
Review.Contenu: Based on my testing, elevenlabs appears to generate the most natural and human-like voices compared to other solutions on the market. While the quality is impressive, I still think that the prices are a little bit to high.

Review.Titre: The zero shot capabilities are the best…
Review.Contenu: The zero shot capabilities are the best by far. Pricing is pretty fair. And they also engaged with the community and updating

Review.Titre: We used the service to create our IVR…
Review.Contenu: We used the service to create our IVR menus and it worked well. Our only disappointment is the lack of diversity in British voices. Many of them sound the same.

Review.Titre: "Fun to use for personal projects, not safe for professional projects
Review.Contenu: What do you like best about ElevenLabs?I like the possibility of your services allowing people with a lot of creativity, but few resources, to create fun and even useful applications.I have been trying to carry out some freelance projects with him, but so far I have not been successful, but I keep trying.Additionally, I have seen game mods, usually including a companion, and giving him a voice. This has also allowed mods that generate dialogue through AI to have their own voice as well.I have high expectations now with the dubbing role, I know there is still a lot to improve, and I can see the potential of breaking down language barriers in interpersonal relationships Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.What do you dislike about ElevenLabs?I don't like how audio generated in languages ​​other than English is monotonous. If it's in English, I can do any project, from audiobooks to interviews. Now outside of this language, the audio generation does not produce correct intonations, which prevents me from using it in projects where this factor is important. Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.What problems is ElevenLabs solving and how is that benefiting you?I like creating content for my personal projects, and it's often interesting to add a voice, but I don't feel comfortable adding my own voice.With ElevenLabs I can meet this need, and create projects that were previously impeded by this detail.

The voices are great, and for the most part it works well. But it has trouble pronouncing some words correctly, and you have to pay for its mistakes, and not just the one word but the whole thing. That's pretty agrivating.
The service is great, hoping for it to become cheaper in the future though.

I use this platform for personal use, and while the quality of the AI is fantastic, the constant need to generate in order to get the tones and emotions I’m looking for means I end up hitting my word limit pretty quickly. I know this is deliberate, as they need to make money, but it would be nice if they were able to introduce some sort of feature that enables you to get the type of voice you’re looking for without having to generate over and over. All in all, great idea but could definitely use some improvement.

Review.Titre: It gave a mute girl a voice
Review.Contenu: I love elevenlabs, the AI is great and I use it as a way to talk in real time with my friends on discord, or in voice chat in general. I'm mute so having an opportunity to use a voice that doesn't sound robotic is wonderful, and I'm really glad I'm able to afford the characters that I manage to use every month. The only thing that I wish was better would be a way to just buy characters. I know you can with a quota, once you get to the creator tier, but I wish there was an option just focused on getting a lot of characters even if by being limited to only one cloned voice or something similar so that I would have the ability to talk a bit more during a month with the budget that I have (which rougly amounts to something between 30$ and 50$ monthly)

Review.Titre: Even when you have a subscription
Review.Contenu: Even when you have a subscription, there are a lot of errors on the voice generators. For one sentence, you can try like 15 times until it sounds right, without any errors. However, when you have a subscription, you can still only use a small amount. I only have 16 sentences, and im already half obove the audio's im aloud to generate!Also the accents randomly changes etc etc. This is really unfair and it means that no one really knows what subscription you really need, because you also pay for the errors. Its possible the subscription of 300$ wouldnt even be enough for just a small project. I hope ElevenLabs will change this!----Reply to your answer:Would you like to send me an email about this new plan please? I would like to try it and hope this would be the solution to the problem. Thank youEDIT: Besides the errors, the platform is still a reccomendation. There are multiple languages and I hope they will just improve it, thats why I changed my stars. (in the hope they would read it and they did :).

Review.Titre: The best of its type of service
Review.Contenu: The top service like this.  Now it only needs to do bulk translation and voice processing.  This could likely be done through Google or some other translate company!

Review.Titre: Serious questions about Subscription and Projects…
Review.Contenu: I have been using ElevenLabs since March of 2023, and I have a couple of serious questions for you.1.	 My client wants to convert another of his novels (90,000 + words) to audio using ElevenLabs. That novel, which used about 30 voices, needs to use about 6 of the same voice since they are central figures in the series. The new novel is presently undergoing the usual rounds of content and syntax editing, so it won’t be ready for at least 3-5 months.Is there a way I can temporarily put my subscription ($99/month) on hold and still retain access to those same voices? Or, should I transfer my ElevenLabs subscription to the author and put the monthly fee under his name with his credit card attached? If he opens up his own account, how can he acquire access to the voices currently under my account? 2.	 I am trying to wrap my head around the purpose of Projects to see if it offers some advantages in my next TTS conversion. Both my client and I are looking for some way to increase efficiency while maintaining quality and flexibility. A.   Does using Projects increase rendering efficiency, and if so, how?B.	On the surface, it appears that Projects was designed as a textual editing program intended to eliminate the standard post- waveform editing process. Is this basically correct?C.	Has Projects eliminated the 500-800 word input limitation for achieving consistent quality during conversion?D.	In my uneducated mind, it seems that Projects was created to better interface with other forms of LLM/ChatGPT/AI programs such as Whisper, rather than act as a standalone TTS entity. In this new form, and again this is my uninformed mind speaking, Projects acts as a coded UI wrapper, surrounded with Python/Java code, that includes the actual conversion engine but has no real effect on the rendered results per se. Is that correct?E.	I don’t know if I’ve guessed the workflow sequencing correctly, but it seems that one enters the text per voice into “holding segments,”and once these segments are deemed to be correct, the entire program is converted in mass into .mp3 or .wav, with all segments tied together in chapter form or as a completed entity. Is that even close to correct?F.	My experience has shown that changes are required for marketing purposes and editorial comments even after the entire book has been rendered. So how are revisions accomplished in the Projects format? Can one add/delete small pieces of the total without redoing the entire Project?Thank you for your help.
It does what it promises. I love the history function. And of course the multilingual option.
ElevenLabs has refunded the monthly instalments mistakenly debited from my bank card. It's all been arranged.
Its the stuff you want fr
Good. Did what I needed. Now I can order takeaway in Batman voice
This is an awesome ai voice website its the most realistic i have found out of like 60 i have tried. I just wish that more features were free

ElevenLabs is the perfect tool for presentations and social media videos. It is free and high quality. Sure if you want to use it long term you have to pay, but if it is once in a while, it’s perfect.

Review.Titre: Hands down the best AI text-to-speech…
Review.Contenu: Hands down the best AI text-to-speech software out there right now, and has been for the past year. But, they don't let their success get to their heads. Because they're continually updating and bringing out incredible new features as well, outpacing all the competition by miles. Can't wait to see how this tech evolves!

Great Work, Best you can get , but unfortunately the new video dubbing feature is useless without a lip sync.The audio quality is awesome but the translation needs to be editable. Orig audio -> transcription->edit-> dub with lip sync. 💲💵🤑💰That’s what I want at least. Right now simple subtitles are doing a better job.

I love the high quality audio of generated voices. The UI is also incredibly easy to navigate and use. The strength levels and variations are a beautiful touch as well.I do want to say however that there can be improvements to the subscription tiers and quote amount. The characters provided can burn very easily (within days of heavy use). Would prefer 2-3 times the amount as a creator (300,000 characters maybe?). It's only fair because some of the audio is not generated properly, and some are not in the correct expression/tone either.

Eleven labs is unbelievably good, I can at last do my own audio book as a hobby with minimal cost...And it's sound professional. I would like it if they had a medium tier in their pricing to jump from 22 to 100 bucks is a bit steep and couldn't use 500k characters in a month. but 100k isn't enough. But I highly recommend it.

The fact that there are such cheap prices with such astounding qualities of work is absolutely insane. A personal favourite feature of mine is the voice cloning in the speech labs. With even a small amount of HQ samples, the output is phenomenal!

Excellent quality of service, albeit quite expensive for low income people like me but the quality of the work is worth it. Its like someone is reading aloud what I wrote and sending me the recording. I just wish they didn't eat so much letter count, like trying to get a different delivery or tone of voice for your lines, each time costs more letter count.

Fantastic AI voices. I'm an author and this is a brilliant tool. During the editing phase, it's so difficult to catch your own mistakes when reading your work back, but the AI voices catch everything, making editing and proof reading a breeze. Can't recommend highly enough.

To be honest, it was my curiousity that caused me problem. I was too careless to explore here until I tried DUBBER. I did try to follow the instruction without knowing you have to pay for it. Because of it, 18k+ character was charge to my action. I panicked so I immediately message them about what happened and tell them everything from my stupidy to being a crying baby. Like I said, I knew it. They are going to consider (again for me to learn) my stupidity. For being fair and considerate and for showing professionalism as the true essence of the word. I gave you guys 5 stars for. I love you guys and thank you

ElevenLabs provides the best speech synthesis technology currently available on the market. The TTS technology is human like with support for several different types of voices, both male and female, and in various languages as well. The voices are also changeable to allow for more variation in the tonality or stricter tone when converting text to speech. I have used the speech synthesis tool on a variety of texts and they all sound lifelike with significant variation in pitch and intonation, just like a real human. The UI is very simple and easy to use. It also shows you how many characters you have remaining. I use it a lot for my personal projects. Also, the output rarely needs to be manually adjusted.

Review.Titre: Really cool conversions of your own audio recordings
Review.Contenu: Converting your own audio recordings into a TTS voice is really excellent. Dubbing a video with spoken language translation also works very well for shorter videos. I am totally surprised and thrilled.

Never have I seen a voice cloning tool do anything so impossible in all my life! :).  I swear, I’m not only listening to realistic sounding voices but voices that only needed like 1 minute of source material as opposed to 15 minutes to 2 hours.  I SO can’t wait for your voice conversion feature to come out; good luck with that!

Review.Titre: Audio Dramas, Will Never Be The Same!
Review.Contenu: I myself, make fan-audio TTS contant for my people to enjoy, and have been using Eleven Labs since March of 2023. Eleven Labs has pioneered the ways in which people can tell their stories and share their thoughts on a wide array of topics from all around the world. From being able to express emotions so elegantly, makes the world of telling stories and memories with people (fictional or not), just makes it more worth while purchasing at least a Starter subscription. And the fact that I can have my original voice available for me to use in whatever audio TTS projects I create, makes it oh the more marrier! Always be mindful where you are in the world before creating fan-projects.

For such a young company, their product is surprisingly robust and even usable in production! It's rare to find products that do so well right off the bat, love following the development and seeing it get better week on week.

Review.Titre: Gold standard for AI based voices
Review.Contenu: It's clear that AI is having a huge impact, and ElevenLabs is at the forefront of this exciting technology. Their voice overs are incredibly convincing, almost as if they were created by a real person. When everything is set up just right, the result is truly remarkable

Review.Titre: ElevenLabs is innovating with AI voices…
Review.Contenu: ElevenLabs is innovating with AI voices in a way which has never been done before. Voices sound lifelike and generate a wide range of emotion depending on the source audio used. They listen to feedback and are consistently updating with new features and bug fixes. Really enjoy the work they're doing. I am particularly impressed with their new dubbing feature. Allowing videos of all different languages to be translated to another language of choice seamlessly and giving people of different languages more enjoyment of various pieces of media.

Review.Titre: The best quality AI voice cloning so far
Review.Contenu: The best quality AI voice cloning so far. Easy to use + affordable and fair price for amateur content creatorsExcellent for narration, but would say it's not yet strong and flexible enough for professional voice acting

Excellent support!Amazing tool and fantastic way to use it!I love that they constantly add features every week!I use it a lot and it is easy to implemet this with other tools! Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

Review.Titre: A powerful tool that keeps on evolving!
Review.Contenu: Voice cloning process was quick and simple to operate.There are a number of occasions when voice generation resulted in an alien language, but that might have to do with the parameters set ( usually when set over the threshold, marked by red). Generating text to voice in Malay language will give you a Bahasa Indonesia voice instead.Overall, I really enjoy using Elevenlabs and looking forward to explore the premium features offered in its premium tiers.

Every time I use this product, I get amazing results. The cloning is spot on as long as you can get a good quality recording to feed it. I use a vocal separator and the Adobe Podcast software to clean it up to sound like it's in a studio, then I feed that into Eleven Labs to get the best cloning I can get. I don't have friends so when I'm making content for VRChat, TikTok, or YouTube, this product is definitely my best friend

Review.Titre: Best AI Platform For High Quality Content
Review.Contenu: Best AI Platform to make high-quality content. I'm super thankful for Eleven Labs because it allowed me to remove me from hours of content creation per week so I could focus on working "on my business" and not "in my business." Cheers guys and gals!

Review.Titre: Can use any language samples to create Voice
Review.Contenu: Mi biggest surprise was to learn that ElevenLabs can transform samples in language A into language B....and even create a voice from samples which are not speaking an actual language
I used the voice cloning and it was an interesting innovation, where we can give our own voice and get it trained. Also the dubbing feature is game changer, try it out

Before deciding to use this service, I took time to try every other similar service so I could make an informed decision on which to choose. As of the time of this review, this is by far the best. Hope this helps someone else save time deciding on which one to go with.
Elevenlabs is one of the best text to speech software on the market. I use it for video ads I create for my clients. I have the ability to clone voices and create voiceover in different languages.

ElevenLabs is amazing, it's quite literally changing the way I use the Internet and make content. I've tried multiple TTS services but nothing has compared to the ease of use and the quality this website provides.

Review.Titre: World's best speech synthesis and so…
Review.Contenu: World's best speech synthesis and so much more. As an example you can convert an e-book to professionally read audio in minutes with ease.

I have been using ElevenLabs to build accessibility tools and implement the audio in numerous languages, and it works like an absolute charm. It's hard to believe the quality of the output voices, and they keep getting better. 10/10 from me.

Review.Titre: This company is doing things that others in this space are too afraid to do!
Review.Contenu: This company is doing things that others in this space seem too afraid to do -- allowing small-time creators access to creative content possibilities through lifelike text to speech, and trusting its users to use this technology responsibly (because it's so good!)The technology behind their lifelike text to speech is the best in the business. And every few months, they keep adding in mind-blowing features that open up entirely new avenues of creation possibilities -- like the ability to dub my video clips in other languages, using MY OWN VOICE.I've been able to seamlessly make changes to my videos and the videos of my clients by adding and altering voiceovers without them needing to take time out of their busy day, so I can deliver the content we all want faster. There literally is no one else I want to use for text to speech now.
Elevenlabs can create amazingly realistic voices from text that match the tone and inflection of anything you write.  True game changer for realism.
The company has been hard at work to create a constantly evolving software, that gets better with each iteration. It is by far the best of it's type.
It's an awesome service! Love using it to create all sorts of content with its voices. The new feature, Dubbing, is nothing short of spetacular! Been using it for months and I don't plan on stopping!

Review.Titre: No other voice cloning comes close.
Review.Contenu: No other voice cloning comes close.. Support could use improvement but the discord makes up for it (always very helpful). Seems crazy a startup has done what OpenAI hasn't.

Review.Titre: They are the Apple of text2speech
Review.Contenu: Have been using ElevenLabs since the inception. There is no one better than them. The interface is clean, the functionality is amazing - this is the cutting edge of this technology. While other websites might look flashier - ElevenLabs is the Apple of text2speech. Highly recommended.

Review.Titre: By far the best text to speech platform
Review.Contenu: Have been using as the text to speech for my company Wondercraft and the voices are just incredible. Also the speed with which the team delivers is something you rarely see, I guess its because they're still small and nimble. Highly recommend.

ElevenLabs is absolutely the best. The rest, (their competitors), are just... robotic! They are not even close to ElevenLabs!ElevenLabs will finally destroy the "Tower of Babel"!😊They have invented a revolutionary technology!ElevenLabs must only learn how to make this jewel they have more practical to specific needs. As I have already told them. Thank you! 😊❤️

I've been using Elevenlabs for a few months now and the experience has been highly positive. The voice quality is clear and natural, indistinguishable from a human speaker. The service is fast, delivering synthesized audio within seconds. As for the price, it's competitive and offers good value for the level of quality and speed provided. Overall, Elevenlabs meets all my criteria for an effective voice synthesis solution

Review.Titre: I've been creating a lot of shorts…
Review.Contenu: I've been creating a lot of shorts (faceless) and between the AI generated people I use, thanks to Leonardo AI and your wonderful voices, things have been great.  Your variety of voices, ethnic and otherwise, and the ability to have my images speak in multiple languages has been helpful.

Review.Titre: By far the best voice cloning service
Review.Contenu: I have tried a handful of other text-to-speech services before Elevenlabs, and while I was not very satisfied by their instant voice cloning (sounded hardly like me, lots of artifacts), I was blown away by the premium version of my cloned voice. Took about a month to be finished, but was well worth the wait. The sound of my voice and the intonation are so realistic that sometimes I honestly can't tell my recordings apart from the AI generated clips.A game changer if you want to use your own voice, but not spend hours recording and editing it.

Review.Titre: The best Voice AI in the world
Review.Contenu: I'm a content creator and private tutor and finding Eleven Labs has been the highlight of my year. Such an amazing tool! I use it every day. What I can suggest is for the user to have the option to control the speed of the speech(if that is possible-I couldn't find it). The tool has some issues when it comes to numbers but it's totally fine when they are presented as words. I am above satisfied!
I'm stunned by the sheer speed of which i'm now able to generate supporting video's to my friends all over the world!

Review.Titre: The latest (and the best) speech synthesis technologies available for peanuts
Review.Contenu: All the reviews which you find here are unfair and biased, written either by ungrateful abusers who do not know the true value of the service they were given access to for peanuts or those who are clueless about their competitors prices. Voice cloning option available at Eleven Labs would cost you at least a thousand bucks with Synthesia. At Eleven Labs you get it for a minimum subscription. How great is that?! Those who were bothered to find out would know that Eleven Labs completes outsourced jobs for the service providers like Rask.ai and its achievements are available for much less than you would pay with Synthesia, Rask.ai and others. The conclusion is that yes, they are not perfect and there are flaws, which I am sure Eleven Labs is aware of (like lack of preview function or custom-spelling option or variety of languages). I do not think they will fix any of these flaws because this is not their main source of income but rather a testing platform - a charity project for activists and hobbyists. And for those who complains about inconsistency of speech results - have you seen 3 bars with a scroller to drag? Well, then check it out! The instruction for fine-tuning using these tools to produce more predictable results are available.
I’ve had such a great experience with Eleven Labs. Their voice AI is fantastic, and I haven’t come close to another company who replicates a voice as successfully
Very easy to use and understand, unlike others that are overly complicated. Tons of voices and styles to choose from. I have had lots of fun using these A.I. voices for video projects.
It is an excellent service that I use every day. One small thing to point out is that they also count the new line when they remove your available characters.

Review.Titre: The best of its kind in the market
Review.Contenu: The best of its kind in the market. I have yet to see another platform top ElevenLabs, so kudos to you guys.

Review.Titre: Elevenlabs: a new frontier for the voice!
Review.Contenu: ElevenLabs is probably the most cutting-edge technology in the text-to-speech process.Due to the generation of unique voices, it is possible to use the application without cloning real voices, although the feature is available.For those producing audiobooks, it is an affordable solution that theoretically allows everyone to produce an enjoyable audiobook.Much can still be done for vocal emotions, but the premise is really good.Thanks to the dubbing function, with elevenlabs one is theoretically able to dub any visual content. Audio descriptions of films for the blind, which are very few in Italy, could triple thanks to the dubbing technology made available by elevenlabs.Vocalized applications can be created, thanks to elevenlabs' natural voices, with minimal cost on character generation.In short, elevenlabs shows promise and is worth supporting.

They have the best TTS voices that I've ever used out of the box. And it's a breeze to create a new one based on less than 1 minute of an audio sample. I love how lifelike it is and how easy it is to use it. There's nobody even close. So good! The API is straightforward and easy to drop in and integrate with any pipeline. The Discord is full of helpful people. The only thing I don't like about them is the price, lol. But in this case, you really get what you pay for, so I can't complain that much. Other than that, it's amazing.
I applied to work here once, the staff are very nice. They listen to their community, offer a great service, overall seem like very good people

Review.Titre: it ate my payment, adleast that's what I thought but I was wrong and it's awesome
Review.Contenu: When I wrote my rating the thing took my payment but it took 4 days to process how ever this seams to be more of a stripe issue in combination with the sofort.com api. The only blame I can put on them is that not integrating PayPal in 2023 kinda sucks. It's taking days to process my payment again so my negative rating will be taken right over to stripes Trustpilot page, and the voice cloning is completely awesome.
Excellent software. And it keeps getting better. This is  best Voice generation software available now. The voices are natural and easy to manipulate.

Review.Titre: Reliable and Effective with Room for Improvement
Review.Contenu: I have been using Eleven Labs' product for a substantial period now and I must say it lives up to its promises. It performs exactly as advertised and has become an integral part of my daily routine. The functionality it offers is robust and the output is consistently reliable, which is why I find myself returning to use it time and again.However, there's one aspect that could significantly enhance the user experience - the addition of a preview feature. It's essential to have a clear understanding of the adjustments made within the settings, especially before finalizing any changes. Currently, it's a bit of a guessing game which sometimes necessitates multiple paid editions to achieve the desired outcome. A preview feature would alleviate this issue, allowing users to see the impact of their settings adjustments before committing to them. This would not only save time but also the additional expense of multiple editions.Despite this, I wholeheartedly recommend Eleven Labs for anyone in need of a reliable solution in this domain. The product is solid, and with a few tweaks, it could be exemplary.

Spectacular industry leading product with immaculate customer service and a wonderful community that backs this pretty cool company. 10/10 would recommend for anyone looking for professional voice clones or people just interested in messing around with new technology.

They recently rolled out a dubbing feature, and it's both hilarious and equally useful – a combination I didn't know I needed until now. The humor intertwined with the practical usability of this feature makes it a unique and enjoyable experience.

Review.Titre: I've been using EllevenLabs for a…
Review.Contenu: I've been using EllevenLabs for a considerable amount of time now, and it has firmly established itself as my go-to platform for AI-generated voices. From pricing to quality, EllevenLabs has consistently impressed me, making it a service I would wholeheartedly recommend to anyone seeking AI-generated voice solutions.Pricing (5/5): One of the standout features of EllevenLabs is its pricing structure. It caters to a wide range of budgets, making it accessible to both individuals and businesses. Whether you're a content creator on a tight budget or a company looking for cost-effective voice solutions, EllevenLabs has you covered. The transparent pricing model ensures that you only pay for what you use, eliminating any hidden fees or unexpected charges.Quality (5/5): The hallmark of any AI-generated voice service is the quality of the voices it produces, and EllevenLabs does not disappoint. The voices generated by this platform are nothing short of remarkable. They are clear, natural-sounding, and highly expressive. Whether you need a voice for narration, voiceovers, or any other application, EllevenLabs delivers voices that sound like they were recorded by a professional human voice actor. The level of detail and nuance in the generated voices is truly impressive.User-Friendly Interface (4/5): EllevenLabs offers a user-friendly interface that is easy to navigate. Setting up a project and generating voices is a straightforward process. However, there is room for improvement in terms of providing more customization options for voice generation. While the default settings work well for most purposes, some users may want more control over pitch, tone, and style.Customer Support (5/5): EllevenLabs shines when it comes to customer support. They are responsive, helpful, and genuinely interested in ensuring that their users have a positive experience. Any questions or concerns I've had were addressed promptly, and the support team goes the extra mile to assist with technical issues or provide guidance on using the service effectively.Versatility (4/5): EllevenLabs caters to a wide range of applications, from voiceovers for videos to automated customer service phone systems. While it excels in most areas, some users may find that the platform's capabilities are slightly limited when it comes to certain niche or highly specialized requirements. However, for the vast majority of users, EllevenLabs offers all the tools necessary to create impressive AI-generated voices.In conclusion, EllevenLabs is a standout platform for AI-generated voices that strikes the perfect balance between affordability and quality. Its pricing accommodates various budgets, and the voice quality is exceptional. While there is some room for improvement in terms of customization options and versatility, EllevenLabs remains an excellent choice for anyone seeking reliable and high-quality AI-generated voices. I highly recommend this service to individuals and businesses alike looking for top-notch voice solutions.EllevenLabs is a standout platform for AI-generated voices that strikes the perfect balance between affordability and quality. Its pricing accommodates various budgets, and the voice quality is exceptional. While there is some room for improvement in terms of customization options and versatility, EllevenLabs remains an excellent choice for anyone seeking reliable and high-quality AI-generated voices. I highly recommend this service to individuals and businesses alike looking for top-notch voice solutions.
Incredible, versatile voices with a superb product and fast-improving roadmap.

Exceptional Text-to-Speech Software for Podcasts and AudiobooksRating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5 stars)I have been using Elevenlabs' text-to-speech software for my podcast and audiobook projects, and I must say that it has exceeded my expectations in every way. This AI tool has truly revolutionized my content creation process, saving me time and ensuring top-notch quality without the need for extensive recording or editing.Effortless Podcast Production:One of the standout features of Elevenlabs is its seamless integration into my podcasting workflow. Instead of spending hours behind the microphone and editing lengthy audio files, I can now simply input my podcast scripts into the software. The results are nothing short of amazing—natural-sounding, expressive voices that engage my audience as if I were delivering the content myself. This not only saves me time but also eliminates the need for complex post-production work.Audiobook Excellence:When it comes to audiobook production, Elevenlabs is a game-changer. It consistently delivers high-quality narration that meets the stringent standards of audiobook platforms. The voices are clear, articulate, and remarkably human-like, making for an immersive listening experience. This has significantly reduced the time and effort I used to spend searching for professional narrators.Customization and Versatility:Elevenlabs offers a range of customization options, allowing me to fine-tune the voice, tone, and pacing to suit the specific requirements of each project. Whether I need a warm, inviting voice for a self-help audiobook or a more formal tone for a podcast on a serious topic, the software delivers with precision. The ability to adjust speech rate and pitch and even add emotion to the narration is a feature I truly appreciate.Seamless Integration:The software seamlessly integrates with my content creation tools, making it incredibly easy to import and export scripts. This means I can copy and paste my content directly into Elevenlabs, saving me valuable time and eliminating compatibility issues.Reliable Support:I have had very few issues with the software, but when I did encounter a minor hiccup, Elevenlabs' customer support team was quick to respond and resolve the problem. Their dedication to customer satisfaction is evident and greatly appreciated.Additionally, I must highlight the remarkable multilingual capability of Elevenlabs. This AI-powered tool allows you to seamlessly switch between 28 different languages, enabling you to create content in a global context effortlessly.Whether you're looking to produce content in Spanish, French, Mandarin, Arabic, or any of the other supported languages, Elevenlabs delivers fluent and natural-sounding narration across the board. This versatility is a significant advantage for content creators who want to reach diverse audiences worldwide, and it has certainly expanded the horizons of my work.The ease with which you can switch between languages and maintain consistent, high-quality narration is a testament to the sophistication and reliability of Elevenlabs. It truly is a comprehensive solution for content creation across linguistic boundaries, making it an indispensable tool for any modern creator.In conclusion, Elevenlabs has become an indispensable part of my content creation toolkit. It has not only improved the efficiency of my podcast and audiobook production but also elevated the overall quality. If you're looking for text-to-speech software that delivers exceptional results, eliminates the need for recording and editing, and enhances your content, I wholeheartedly recommend Elevenlabs. It's a powerful tool that has made my work as a content creator significantly more enjoyable and efficient.I wholeheartedly bow my head in salute to the creative minds behind this remarkable technological innovation. Their dedication, ingenuity, and commitment to pushing the boundaries of what AI can achieve deserve my utmost respect and admiration. Elevenlabs has undeniably made a significant impact on the world of content creation, simplifying and enhancing the way we produce and consume audio content. It's a testament to the power of human creativity and technological advancement, and I'm excited to see what the future holds for such groundbreaking innovations.
